thread.section_title: GameSeek Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.gameseek.co.uk | 8 of 278
thread.title: Richard Brown

author: Richard Brown
title: Richard Brown
text: I read a few mediocre reviews regarding this seller so was apprehensive about buying from them. I can only say the service I received was exceptional. I found the best price around with free delivery. The item itself was delivered in 3-4 days. I would no hesitation in buying again. Please do not let a few bad reviews put you off. My son is now delighted with the controller and can now play games with his friends when they come to visit. Excellent service.
